April 2, 2025 - In 2006, Columbia acquired the Pacific Trail and Montrail brands, and in 2014 they acquired Prana. In 2001, the company moved its headquarters from Portland to a site in an unincorporated part of Washington County, in the Cedar Mill area and just outside the Beaverton city limits.
